content.title: Intro
content.content:
2014
Preceded by
2014
2015
Year
2016
Followed by
2016

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2015.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
10 - 11 - Mythmoot III.
15 - A Brief History of The Hobbit is published.
16 - Perilous and Fair is published.
? - Amon Hen 251 is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
14 - Actor Alan Howard dies.
26 - Smith of Wootton Major pocket edition is published.
27 - Actor and singer Leonard Nimoy dies.

content.title: March
content.content:
5 - Artist and linguist Tom Loback dies.
12 - Terry Pratchett dies.
24 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released for digital download.
24 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the USA.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
? - Amon Hen 252 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
20 - Voice actor Peter Howell dies.
20 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
27 - Cinematographer Andrew Lesnie dies.

content.title: May
content.content:
15 - Voice actor John Stephenson dies.
21 - Beowulf: A Translation and Commentary by J.R.R. Tolkien, edited by Christopher Tolkien, is published in paperback.
? - Amon Hen 253 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
7 - Actor Christopher Lee dies.
12 - Parma Eldalamberon 22 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
4 - The Tolkien Society Seminar at the Hilton, Leeds.
7 - Representations of Nature in Middle-earth is published.
21 – Actor Theodore Bikel dies.
30 - Tolkien Calendar 2016 is published.
31 - 3 Aug. - Mythcon 46 in Hotel Elegante, Colorado Springs.
? - Amon Hen 254 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
3 - Jef Murray dies.
6-9 - Omentielva Enquea - Sixth International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages in Greisinger Museum, Switzerland.
11 - Actor Richard Whiteside dies.
27 - The Story of Kullervo is published in the UK.
31 - Journeys & Destinations is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
5-6 - Middle-earth Festival at Sarehole Mill, Birmingham.
10-13 - Oxonmoot 2015 at St Antony's College, Oxford.
21 - Arne Zettersten, colleague and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
? - Amon Hen 255 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
6 - Árpád Göncz dies.
8 - The Art of The Lord of the Rings is published in the UK.
13 - The Art of The Lord of the Rings is published in the US.
20 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies Extended Edition is released for digital download.

content.title: November
content.content:
5 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Chronicles: The Art of War is published.
17 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies Extended Edition is released on Blu-ray and DVD in Canada and the USA.
18 - The Tolkien Treasury is published.
23 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies Extended Edition is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
? - Fan Phenomena: The Lord of the Rings is published.
? - Amon Hen 256 is published.
? - Mallorn 56 is published.
